org.redpin.android.ui.mapview
Class ZoomAndScrollImageView

java.lang.Object
  View
      org.redpin.android.ui.mapview.ZoomAndScrollImageView

public class ZoomAndScrollImageView
extends View

ImageView that is capable of zooming and scrolling an image.

Author:
Pascal Brogle (broglep@student.ethz.ch)
